title: i got banned when i talked to a toxic and racism players

replies.body:
You seem somewhat familiar with how chat restrictions work, given how you were saying other players were going to be punished. Saying you're going to report players isn't necessary, as it only takes 1 report to trigger a review of someone's chat logs. You also kept saying other players were going to be punished, and you kept pointing out other players' low scores in order to insult or harass them. This continued on into the post-game. If you've had prior chat restrictions, then a 2-week suspension was warranted here.

I'm also curious what you meant when you said this line: 

0vx0v0vx0: 关键是他真的脑残

Edit: And while you may not have said extremely negative comments, these comments are still negative, and if you have a consistent history of being negative in games, you will get punished by Riot's system.

Were you appointed as team captain and coach? You spend the entire game barking orders and belittling people for mistakes. News flash - everyone is allowed to play the game as they see fit and they are not required to obey your commands.

They look at what you say, and what **you** say alone. Infact, they look at multiple games of what you said and punish you based on your consistency and severity. 

Typically, "report askers" don't know that what they are doing counts as harassment, so they keep doing it over many many games and eventually get punished. 

Of course, it's not just the asking for reports that counts towards your punishment. The general condescending attitude does as well.

Very rough google translation for those who don't want to do it themselves, not gonna even try to fix any errors:

0vx0v0vx0: brothers

0vx0v0vx0: you are on the road to Kenan
0vx0v0vx0: i gank you

0vx0v0vx0: really no way
0vx0v0vx0: on the road this ugat
0vx0v0vx0: let me gank him
0vx0v0vx0: a Kenan gank
0vx0v0vx0: ？
0vx0v0vx0: he is an ugart
0vx0v0vx0: walking slow
0vx0v0vx0: i went straight to Kenan
0vx0v0vx0: there is a big
0vx0v0vx0: the key is that he is really brain-dead
0vx0v0vx0: if you win, you can win
0vx0v0vx0: this doesn't matter to him
0vx0v0vx0: you and the way down c
0vx0v0vx0: this adc is still a chinese
0vx0v0vx0: you are also playing well in the middle of the road
0vx0v0vx0: i helped a few times in the middle
0vx0v0vx0: still being single killed
0vx0v0vx0: we assist
0vx0v0vx0: 20% win rate
0vx0v0vx0: i also served.

Constant arguing, calling for reports, announcing your own reports, telling people to STFU, telling people they'll be banned, etc. are not constructive, positive, or welcome additions to chat. All you're doing is making it worse, which is why you were punished.
